Package org.neo4j.internal.id.indexed

Class IdRangeMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.id.indexed.IdRangeMarker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, IdGenerator.Marker, IndexedIdGenerator.ReservedMarker
    class IdRangeMarker
extends Object
implements IdGenerator.Marker, IndexedIdGenerator.ReservedMarker
    Contains logic for merging ID state changes into the tree backing an IndexedIdGenerator. Basically manipulates IdRangeKey and IdRange instances and sends to Writer.merge(Object, Object, ValueMerger).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean bridgeIdGaps
      Whether or not to bridge gaps between previously highest written id and id being written as updates comes in.
      private AtomicBoolean freeIdsNotifier
      Set to true as soon as this marker marks any id as "free", so that the FreeIdScanner will go through the effort of even starting a scan for free ids.
      private long generation
      Generation that this marker was instantiated at.
      private AtomicLong highestWrittenId
      Highest written id that this id generator has ever done.
      private int idsPerEntry
      Number of ids that is contained in one IdRange
      private IdRangeKey key
      IdRangeKey instance to populate with data as ids are being written.
      private Lock lock
      Lock for making this marker have exclusive access to updates.
      private ValueMerger<IdRangeKey,​IdRange> merger
      Which GBPTree ValueMerger to use, may be different depending on whether or not the id generator has been fully started, i.e. different whether it's recovery mode or normal operations mode.
      private IndexedIdGenerator.Monitor monitor
      Receives notifications of events.
      private boolean started
      Whether or not the id generator has been started.
      private IdRange value
      IdRange instance to populate with data as ids are being written.
      private Writer<IdRangeKey,​IdRange> writer
      GBPTree writer of id state updates.

    • Field Detail

      • idsPerEntry

        private final int idsPerEntry
        Number of ids that is contained in one IdRange

      • writer

        private final Writer<IdRangeKey,​IdRange> writer
        GBPTree writer of id state updates.

      • lock

        private final Lock lock
        Lock for making this marker have exclusive access to updates. Unlocked on close().

      • merger

        private final ValueMerger<IdRangeKey,​IdRange> merger
        Which GBPTree ValueMerger to use, may be different depending on whether or not the id generator has been fully started, i.e. different whether it's recovery mode or normal operations mode.

      • started

        private final boolean started
        Whether or not the id generator has been started.

      • freeIdsNotifier

        private final AtomicBoolean freeIdsNotifier
        Set to true as soon as this marker marks any id as "free", so that the FreeIdScanner will go through the effort of even starting a scan for free ids.

      • generation

        private final long generation
        Generation that this marker was instantiated at. It cannot change as long as this marker is unclosed. All ranges written by this marker will get updated with this generation.

      • highestWrittenId

        private final AtomicLong highestWrittenId
        Highest written id that this id generator has ever done. Used by this marker to fill gaps between previously highest written id and the id being written with deleted ids.

      • bridgeIdGaps

        private final boolean bridgeIdGaps
        Whether or not to bridge gaps between previously highest written id and id being written as updates comes in.

      • key

        private final IdRangeKey key
        IdRangeKey instance to populate with data as ids are being written.

      • value

        private final IdRange value
        IdRange instance to populate with data as ids are being written.

      • monitor

        private final IndexedIdGenerator.Monitor monitor
        Receives notifications of events.

      • bridgeGapBetweenHighestWrittenIdAndThisId

        private void bridgeGapBetweenHighestWrittenIdAndThisId​(long id)
        Fills the space between the previously highest ever written id and the id currently being updated. The ids between those two points will be marked as deleted, or in the recovery case (where started is false marked as deleted AND free. This solves a problem of not losing track of ids that have been allocated off of high id, but either not committed or failed to be committed.
        Parameters:
        id - the id being updated.
